description: Test cases for session lobby where host waits for players to join

test_cases.name: Display Session Lobby After Proposing
test_cases.expected_result: Session Lobby screen displays with session name, time, and player count (0 of X joined)

test_cases.name: Display Host Information
test_cases.expected_result: Host card displays avatar, name, skill level, and games played

test_cases.name: Invite Players Button
preconditions: User is on Session Lobby as host
test_cases.expected_result: Invite modal or screen opens allowing host to invite players

test_cases.name: Auto-Match Information Display
test_cases.expected_result: Auto-match description displayed: 'Sportio will recommend players nearby who are free during this time'

test_cases.name: Player Joins Session - Counter Updates
steps: Wait for player to join session
test_cases.expected_result: Player count updates (e.g., '1 of 4 players joined')

test_cases.name: Join Session as Player
test_cases.expected_result: User added to session, navigated to session detail

test_cases.name: View Session Details from Lobby
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Session Detail screen

test_cases.name: Lock and Book When Ready
preconditions: User is host on Session Lobby
test_cases.expected_result: User navigated to Venue Suggestions screen

test_cases.name: Lock and Book Button Disabled When Insufficient Players
preconditions: User is host on Session Lobby
test_cases.expected_result: Button is disabled or shows message about minimum players required

test_cases.name: Navigate Back to Home from Lobby
